searchDocs.title: RegisterService​
searchDocs.content: This item is read only and cannot be modified. Read Only </> NetworkService.RegisterService: userdata Registers the LOOM NetworkService

searchDocs.title: GetModule​
searchDocs.content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields Modules </> LOOM.GetModule( self: any,-- The LOOM userdata. Name: string-- The moudle to get ) → any?-- The requried module.

searchDocs.title: GetService​
searchDocs.content: Services </> LOOM.GetService( self: any,-- The LOOM userdata. Name: string-- The requested LOOM service. ) → any?-- The LOOM Service. Gets and returns the requried registered LOOM service. DANGER This method will error if init isn't called or service is nil.

searchDocs.title: Init​
searchDocs.content: This is a yielding function. When called, it will pause the Lua thread that called the function until a result is ready to be returned, without interrupting other scripts. Yields </> LOOM.Init() → () Starts up the LOOM Services. DANGER Init will error if it is called mutiple times.

searchDocs.title: hookservice​
searchDocs.content: Services </> LOOM.hookservice( Name: string,-- The service to hook Target: string,-- The metamethod to hook New: Function-- The function to re-write the metamethod with. ) → any Hooks a LOOM Service. DANGER This method will error with missing parameters.

searchDocs.title: CreateService​
searchDocs.content: Services </> LOOM.CreateService( self: any,-- The LOOM userdata Name: string,-- The name of the new LOOM Service Closure: any,-- The functions \ properties of the new LOOM Service. ReadOnly: boolean?,-- Sets the Loom service in a table.freeze and also locks the metatable. (Defaults to false) Type: string?,-- The string to return when typeof is calle don the Service. (Defaults to "Instance") LockMessage: string?-- The message to return when getmetatable() is called on the Service (Defaults to "Loom Service") ) → any?-- The service that was just created. Creates & Registers a new LOOM service. CAUTION ReadOnly parameter will ONLY work in live roblox games, not studio.

searchDocs.title: hookservice​
searchDocs.content: deprecated in v0 </> This was deprecated in v0 Keep in note this function will be deprecated and replaced with something else. LOOM.hookservice( Name: string, Target: string, New: any ) → any
